Author: plushiealien
Text: Truly same I was bodychecking in the good ol target dressing for a hour yesterday because I looked so.......different

Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: You are making connections you don’t have to. Do you think you could cover/remove it? Maybe get a fun hand mirror for hair/make up or whatever? It’s really easy to tie a negative thought to a context. Something to think about.   I can absolutely identify,I feel like the mirrors in my house make me look worse than the cameras they have at self checkouts aka the most unflattering angle and lighting possible. Side bar conspiracy moment, I’m pretty sure those are just so terrible to make everyone who uses them already look like a criminal for court cases. But somehow I’ll catch myself in a building window and be like dang who is she?
